verses.verse: I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> again, and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> with a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H2256>line<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H575>Where<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> you? And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, To <S%H4058>measure<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof, and <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof.

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him,

And <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7323>Run,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H1975>this<s%> <S%H5288>young<s%> man, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> as <S%H6519>towns<s%> without walls for the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> and <S%H929>cattle<s%> <S%H8432>therein:<s%>
For I, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> will be to her a <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and will be the <S%H3519>glory<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of her.

<S%H1945>Ho,<s%> <S%H1945>ho,<s%> come forth, and <S%H5127>flee<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for I have <S%H6566>spread<s%> you <S%H6566>abroad<s%> as the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H4422>Deliver<s%> yourself, O <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> has he <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which <S%H7997>spoiled<s%> you: for he that <S%H5060>touches<s%> you <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H892>apple<s%> of his <S%H5869>eye.<s%>

For, <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5130>shake<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on them, and they shall be a <S%H7998>spoil<s%> to their <S%H5647>servants:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me.

<S%H7442>Sing<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> for, see, I <S%H935>come,<s%> and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall be <S%H3867>joined<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and shall be my <S%H5971>people:<s%> and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of you, and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> his <S%H2506>portion<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H127>land,<s%> and shall <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5750>again.<s%>
Be <S%H2013>silent,<s%> O <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for he is <S%H5782>raised<s%> up out of his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation.<s%>
